info.name: Ko-la
info.description:
Sure, coffee can be taken black
But cola's nicer

Also, because it fits, if you like this, why not consider buying me a cola?
https://ko-fi.com/jordy3d
info.additionalInfo:
Update 1
- Changes on their end changed this, so updated to match noticed changes.

Update 2
- Minor changes here and there from things on their end
- Gallery is dark now

Update 3 - Big one!
- Lots of missing stuff from previous Ko-fi updates fixed
- Updated to better fit the new style for comments and the like
- Updated the landing page for non-account users
- Updated the profile page, should be no major annoying white blocks now!

Update 4 - The long wait!
- Front page was missing some text after a change a while back, but since not many download it and I don't have a reason to check it often, it was left til now
- Few minor changes here and there with other changes that occurred on their end.

Update 5 - The missed messages
- So I never made a post, which means I never darkened the Make a Post page. That's done now!
- Minor changes

Update 6 - Mini Update
- Some stuff was changed in the Dashboard, so they've been updated here too

Update 7 - Something changed
- I think there was just some changes on their end. Logged in and saw it, so changed them back.
